---
title: "Events"
---

```{r, echo = F, results = 'asis'}
pacman::p_load(readxl)
events <- read_excel("Resources/events_for_website.xlsx")

info <- function(x){
  # Date
  cat(paste0("#### ", events[x,1],"  "), fill = T)
  # Speaker
  cat(paste0("**", events[x,2],"**  "), fill = T)
  # Location
  cat(paste0("Location: ",events[x,3], "  "), fill = T)
  # Time
  cat(paste0("Time: ",events[x,4], "  "), fill = T)
  # Topic
  if(!is.na(events[x,5])){
    cat(paste0("Topic: ",events[x,5], "  "), fill = T)
  }
  # Topic
  if(!is.na(events[x,6])){
    cat(paste0("Abstract: ",events[x,6], "  "), fill = T)
  }
  cat("  ", fill = T)
  cat("  ", fill = T)
}
```

```{r, echo = F, results = 'asis'}
for(i in 1:nrow(events)){
  info(i)
}
```
